Package bcu.s17119577.adventure.effects

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Effect
    Interface to model every effect that will be created in the game.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DoAction
    Gets an action of a given name from the world and executes all of it's effects.
    DropItem
    An effect that removes a given item from the player's inventory.
    GoDirection
    An effect that allows the user to change their location in the world.
    LookItem
    Effect that allows the player to inspect and item's name and description
    LookLocation
    Effect that allows the user to inspect their current location by printing out a description of the location.
    Message
    A simple effect that prints a message passed to it.
    Quit
    Effect that quits the game by throwing a custom QuitException
    ShowInventory
    Effects that allows the player to view their inventory
    TakeItem
    Effect that allows the player to take an item and place it in their inventory
